string.text: Start talking, buddy.
I'm all ears, buddy.
Well, hello!
Quit waving that thing about!
Get that thing out of my face!
You think you're hard or something? Holster that shooter!
If you want to go back in one piece, put that piece away!
Look! I'm going to pull mine out too!
Don't be threatening us with that heater! We got enough of our own!
Go, find someone else to annoy, buddy.
I ain't feeling talkative right now.
Beat it!
What the hell is wrong with you?
Less yapping, more shooting!
You picked a good time to talk...
Speak to the big bad boss.
I don't get paid to listen to your shit. The boss does.
If you need something, the boss is over there.
I ain't talking to you when you got that thing in my face!
Put that shooter away, then we'll talk.
Holster that shooter or get lost!
Whatcha' need stalker?
Stalker, what do you want?
Whatcha' need?
Put your weapon away, man.
Quit screwing around! Holster your weapon!
Come on, man, put that weapon away!
Talk to the boss if you need something...
Speak to the boss.
The boss is over there. Go, talk to him.
Put that gun away, then we'll talk.
Holster that weapon if you wanna talk.
First you put that gun away.
Put that gun away, then we'll talk.
Holster that weapon if you wanna talk.
First you put that gun away.
Put that piece away!
Holster your weapon.
Hide that weapon!
I said put that shooter behind your back!
No funny business. Holster that thing.
The Zone seems to be getting the worst kind of folks lately.
Ah well, whatever you say... or don't say.
Oh I see, you never learned English in the first place.
How much longer do I have to wait?
Are you taking a nap over there?
Yo, wake up!
Dude, let go of the brake.
Did you want something?
Are you slow or what?
You're a tongue-tied nerd, that's what you are.
Oh no! Not another mute.
So, what is it that you need?
What do you want anyway?
What's up, stalker?
Tell me what you want already.
Speak up, will ya!
You have some business for me or what?
What's with this stalling?
What are you waiting for?
The Zone seems to be getting the worst kind of folks lately.
Ah well, whatever you say... or don't say.
Oh I see, you never learned English in the first place.
Whatcha' need stalker?
Stalker, what do you want?
Whatcha' need?
What's new?
Hail and well met!
Time's money. Get talking!
Holster that weapon, friend.
Holster your weapon.
Put that weapon away, chief.
Get that weapon holstered man.
Put that gun away now!
Put that weapon away, man!
Do you need any help getting rid of that weapon?
Dude... Put that shooter away.
Nah, I don't feel like talking.
Sorry, but I'm not in the mood to chat.
I can't talk right now.
We'll talk another time.
Later. We'll talk later.
This is a bad time to yap.
Speak to the squad commander if you want something.
Stalker, direct your questions to the commander.
Go see the commander.
We can chat when that weapon is not in my face.
Either put that shooter away, or just go away!
We'll talk when you holster your weapon.
Did you forget how to holster a weapon?
We ain't gonna have a conversation like this.
If you don't holster your weapon, it will be the only thing you can talk to!
What do you say?
I'm listening.
Good day.
Hey, now, that won't do. Let's not point any guns.
You can holster that weapon first.
Put away your gun first, man.
I don't have anything to talk about right now, alright?
Sorry, I'd rather not speak right now.
Don't bother me with any chit-chat, please.
You seriously want to talk? Get down, idiot!
Later! We'll talk later!
Have you got a head on your shoulders? Not now!
I don't have anything to talk about right now, alright?
Sorry, there is nothing to talk about.
Spare me the chit-chat.
If you wanna talk, put down that weapon.
Hide that shooter, man. Otherwise, I have no business with you.
Hey, now, that won't do. Let's not point any guns.
Well, spill it!
I'm listening, man.
What's up, bro?
Don't play the hero. Keep that shooter holstered.
Holster your shooter, damn it!
Peace out, man! Holster that cannon of yours.
Don't you pull anything. And hide that shooter, will ya?
That's enough! Stop waving that piece around.
Hide your toy now!
Holster that friggin' shooter.
Scram!
This conversation ain't happening, and that's the end of it!
I can't be bothered to chat now.
Dude, you're crazy!
There's like, shooting and stuff, you know?
It's hardly the time to talk.
Go, talk to the boss, man!
I doubt I can tell you anything useful. Go, see the chief.
Leave me alone, man. Speak to the boss, he's over there.
You planning to shoot or talk? Holster that weapon!
I ain't keen on talking to people who are pointing a gun at me.
We'll talk once that shooter is holstered.
Are you here to shoot, or to talk?
Dude. Your metal persuasion, it's gotta go!
Are you using that big toy to compensate for something?
Come here. I won't bite.
Hey, bro!
Who are you?
You hide that gun!
If you want to talk, lower that gun and come up slowly!
If you want to talk, lower that gun and come up slowly!
You hide that gun!
If you want to talk, lower that gun and come up slowly!
You hide that gun!
I'm not talking to you.
I don't feel like chatting with you.
I ain't in the mood for gum beating.
Not now!
Are you crazy? Not now!
Can't you see we're in battle?
I don't feel like chattering. Go talk to the commander.
If you need anything, go to the commander. Talk to him.
I don't feel like chattering. Go talk to the commander.
I ain't talking to you when you got that thing in my face!
Put that shooter away, then we'll talk.
Holster that shooter or get lost!
Howdy?
What do you want?
Well? I'm listening...
Lower your weapon.
Put your weapon away!
Holster your weapon.
I ain't got the time to talk.
I can't help you.
Leave me alone, major.
We'll talk when the fight is over.
Quit this chatter and focus!
Not a good time to talk, man.
Go, see the commander.
The commander can answer your questions.
I do shooting. The commander does Q&A sessions.
If you want to talk, holster your weapon.
I ain't talking with you pointing that thing at me.
Holster your weapon if you want to talk.
Trust no one other than the Monolith and your fellow brothers. No one.
It's too quiet here.
I believe I've been here before at some point. I cannot remember.
Strange... Everything here is strange.
Monolith... Great Monolith.
The enemies are near... Such is the will of the Monolith.
Monolith... I am your faithful servant.
Let's keep to ourselves.
It is not worth it to speak in vain.
I do not want to speak right now.
Howdy-ho?
Hey, bro!
I'm listening...
Put your weapon away, man.
Quit screwing around! Holster your weapon!
Come on, man, put that weapon away!
Hide your gun now!
Quit waving that pop gun at me!
What's with the shooter?
I'm not talking to you.
I don't feel like chatting with you.
I ain't in the mood for gum beating.
This ain't the time to yap, man.
Are you crazy? We'll talk after!
Sure you want to chit-chat with all this shit going on?
Talk to the boss if you need something...
Speak to the boss.
The boss is over there. Go, talk to him.
Put that shooter away and then we'll talk.
I'm not really talkative when there's a gun being waved in my face. Shocking, eh?
I don't feel like talking when you've got me in your sights.
Come on man! Put that weapon away.
Don't be a jerk, holster your weapon.
Stop waving that gun, you've got my attention.
We might have a conversation if you hide that weapon.
Why are you holding onto that weapon?
What's with the shooter?
There's no talking with guns!
Quit waving that pop gun at me!
Hide your gun now!
I'm listening.
Come on, spill the beans.
Can't you see I'm busy? Get to the point.
Are you shy or something? Come on, talk to me.
Come on don't be shy, speak up.
If you're here to talk business, do it.
Good, enough quiet already, speak up!
Wake up and smell the coffee.
Come on, speak up already.
Come on, start sharing.
Well, do you want something or don't you?
Do I have to speak for both of us here?
Talking to a mute is a moot point.
Come back when you learn how to talk.
I'm thoroughly enjoying this conversation. Not.
Huh. Nice chat that was.
Is this a silence contest? Okay, you win.
Damned if I know what you want from me.
Wake up and smell the coffee!
Come on, speak up already.
Come on, start sharing.
Well, do you want something or don't you?
Do I have to speak for both of us here?
Nice chat that was.
Is this a silence contest? Okay, you win.
Damned if I know what you want from me.
If you've got something to say, say it.
I'm all ears.
I'm listening.
Can't you see I'm busy? Get to the point.
Are you shy or something? Come on, talk to me!
Come on, don't be shy, speak up.
If you're here to talk business, do it.
Dude, enough quite already, speak up!
